info.title: poe.watch API
info.description:
API providing market data and price information for the game Path of Exile.
Allows users to query active leagues, item categories, current item prices within leagues (with filtering), historical price data, enchantment/corruption data, compact data, and API status.
Price data typically uses Chaos Orbs as the base unit.

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: Operations related to item categories used in the API

tags.name: Items
tags.description: Operations related to current item prices and data retrieval with filtering

tags.name: Item Details
tags.description: Operations related to specific item details like history, enchantments, and corruptions

tags.name: Combined Data
tags.description: Operations for retrieving combined data sets

tags.name: Status
tags.description: Operations related to API status and data processing state

get.description: Retrieves a list of leagues currently tracked or available in the poe.watch database (includes past leagues for history).

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of leagues.

500.description: Internal server error occurred while fetching leagues.

get.description: Retrieves a list of valid item categories that can be used as the `category` parameter in the `/get` endpoint.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of item categories.

500.description: Internal server error occurred while fetching categories.

get.summary: Get Current Item Data by Category
get.description:
Retrieves current market data for a specified category of items within a specific *currently active* league.
Requires both the `league` and `category` parameters. Allows optional filtering.
Item prices (`mean`, `min`, `max`) are typically represented as Chaos Orb equivalents.
Use the `/categories` endpoint to find valid category names.
Note: This endpoint only works for *current* leagues. For historical data, use the `/history` endpoint.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the *current* league to query (e.g., the current challenge league name, Standard, Hardcore).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The item category name (obtained from `/categories`) to retrieve data for (e.g., `currency`, `armour`, `weapon`, `gem`).

parameters.name: lowConfidence
parameters.description: Filter results based on price confidence (e.g., `true` to potentially include items with fewer data points).

parameters.name: linkCount
parameters.description: Filter by the number of linked sockets on an item.

parameters.name: gemLevel
parameters.description: Filter gems by their level.

parameters.name: gemCorrupted
parameters.description: Filter gems based on whether they are corrupted (`true`) or not (`false`).

parameters.name: itemLevel
parameters.description: Filter items by their item level (ilvl).

parameters.name: gemQuality
parameters.description: Filter gems by their quality.

200.description: Successfully retrieved item data for the specified league and category, potentially filtered.

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing required query parameters (`league` or `category`), invalid parameter values, or attempting to query an old league.

500.description: Internal server error occurred while fetching item data.

get.description: Retrieves a list of currently trending items for a specific league.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the *current* league to query (e.g., the current challenge league name, Standard, Hardcore).

200.description: Successfully retrieved trending items for the specified league.

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing required query parameter (`league`).

500.description: Internal server error occurred while fetching trending items.

get.description: Searches for items by name in a specific league.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the *current* league to query (e.g., the current challenge league name, Standard, Hardcore).

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query for the item name.

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing required query parameters (`league` or `q`).

500.description: Internal server error occurred while searching for items.

get.description: Retrieves current market data for Inscribed Ultimatum items within a specific league. This is a special case for the Inscribed Ultimatum item type.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The league to query for Inscribed Ultimatum data.

200.description: An array of Inscribed Ultimatum data.

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing required query parameter (`league`) or invalid parameter values.

404.description: Not Found. The specified league does not have Inscribed Ultimatum data or the item ID is invalid.

get.description:
Retrieves the historical price data for a *specific item* (identified by its ID) within a specific league (current or past).
Requires the `league` parameter and the `id` parameter.
Item IDs might be discoverable via the `/get` or `/compact` endpoints, though not explicitly documented how to find all IDs.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the league (current or past) for which to retrieve the price history (e.g., "Heist", "Standard", "Necropolis").

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of the item to get price history for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the price history for the specified item ID and league.

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing required query parameters (`league` or `id`).

404.description: Not Found. The specified league or item ID could not be found or has no historical data available.

500.description: Internal server error occurred while fetching price history.

get.description: Retrieves known Labyrinth enchantment price data for a specific item (identified by its ID) within a given league.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the league (current or past) to query.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of the item (typically a helmet or boots) to get enchant data for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved enchantment data for the item.

example.name: Penance Brand has 24% increased Area of Effect

404.description: Not Found. The specified league or item ID was not found or has no enchant data.

get.description: Retrieves known Vaal Orb corruption outcome price data for a specific item (identified by its ID) within a given league.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the league (current or past) to query.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of the item to get corruption data for.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If `true`, returns data for all items.

200.description: Successfully retrieved corruption data for the item.

example.name: #% increased Attack Speed during any Flask Effect

404.description: Not Found. The specified league or item ID was not found or has no corruption data.

get.summary: Get Compact Data for All Categories
get.description: Retrieves a combined, compact dataset containing item data across potentially all categories for a specific *currently active* league. Structure is similar to `/get` results but nested under an "items" key.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: The name of the *current* league to query (e.g., "Necropolis").

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If `true`, returns data for all items. If `false` or not provided, returns only items with current data.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the compact data for the league.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing required league parameter or league is not current.

get.description: Returns the latest processed public stash tab change ID and statistics about the number of stashes processed in the current cycle. Primarily for monitoring API data freshness.

InscribedUltimatumItem.description: Represents market data for a single Inscribed Ultimatum.

League.description: Represents a Path of Exile league tracked by poe.watch.

name.description: The display name of the league.

start_date.description: The date and time the league started (ISO 8601 format).

end_date.description: The date and time the league ended or is scheduled to end (ISO 8601 format). A very old date (e.g., year 0001) indicates it's ongoing (like Standard/Hardcore).

Category.description: Represents an item category usable in API queries.

name.description: The internal name of the category used in the `category` query parameter.

display.description: The user-friendly display name for the category.

groups.description: Sub-groups within this category (content may vary).

ItemData.description: Represents market data for a specific item within a league category. Field availability may vary by item type.

category.description: The category this item belongs to (matches the 'category' query parameter used in /get or inferred in /compact).

group.description: The specific group within the category (e.g., 'helmets', 'skillgem', 'stackable').

frame.description: Represents the item frame type (e.g., 0=Normal, 1=Magic, 2=Rare, 3=Unique, 4=Gem, 5=Currency, 6=Divination Card, etc.). May vary slightly.

influences.description: Indicates item influences (Shaper, Elder, Crusader, etc.). Null if none. Structure unknown.

linkCount.description: Number of linked sockets (0 for non-linkable items). Relevant for armour/weapons.

icon.description: URL to the item's icon on the Path of Exile CDN.

mean.description: The average price of the item in Chaos Orbs.

mode.description: The most frequent price (mode) of the item in Chaos Orbs. Might be 0 if not applicable or calculated.

min.description: The minimum observed price of the item in Chaos Orbs.

max.description: The maximum observed price of the item in Chaos Orbs.

exalted.description: The price of the item represented in Exalted Orbs (value relative to Chaos).

total.description: Meaning unclear from documentation (possibly total listings ever?).

daily.description: Number of listings observed recently (possibly within the last 24 hours?).

current.description: Meaning unclear from documentation (possibly current active listings?).

accepted.description: Meaning unclear from documentation (possibly listings used in price calculation?).

change.description: Recent price change percentage or value (interpretation depends on API). Positive might indicate increase.

history.description: A small array representing recent price points (e.g., last 7 days) in Chaos Orbs.

lowConfidence.description: True if the price data is based on a small number of listings or has high variance.

perfectPrice.description: Estimated price for a 'perfect' version of the item (e.g., max rolls), in Chaos Orbs. 0 if not applicable.

perfectAmount.description: Number of listings considered for the perfect price calculation.

implicits.description: List of implicit modifiers on the item. Null if none.

explicits.description: List of explicit modifiers on the item. Null if none or not applicable (like currency).

gemLevel.description: The level of the gem. Only applicable for gems.

gemQuality.description: The quality of the gem. Only applicable for gems.

gemIsCorrupted.description: Indicates if the gem is corrupted. Only applicable for gems.

essenceTier.description: Tier of the essence. Only applicable for essences.

watchstonesUses.description: Number of uses for Sextants on Watchstones (likely deprecated system).

mapSeries.description: Map series identifier (e.g., Atlas Invasion, Conquerors). May be deprecated or changed.

mapTier.description: Tier of the map. Only applicable for maps.

PriceHistoryEntry.description: Represents a single data point in an item's price history.

mean.description: The average price in Chaos Orbs at this point in time.

date.description: Timestamp (ISO 8601 format) indicating when this data point was recorded.

id.description: An identifier field present in the response, seems constant (0) in examples. Its purpose is unclear.

EnchantData.description: Represents price data for a specific Labyrinth enchantment on an item.

name.description: The text of the enchantment modifier.
name.example: Penance Brand has 24% increased Area of Effect

value.description: The estimated price (in Chaos Orbs) for an item with this specific enchantment.

lowConfidence.description: Indicates if the price estimate has low confidence.

CorruptionData.description: Represents price data for a specific Vaal Orb corruption outcome on an item.

name.description: The text of the corruption implicit modifier (may contain placeholders like '#').

mean.description: The estimated average price (in Chaos Orbs) added by this specific corruption outcome.

CompactData.description: Container for the bulk item data returned by the /compact endpoint.

items.description: An array containing item data across multiple categories for the specified league.

StatusData.description: Represents the API's data processing status.

changeID.description: The last processed public stash tab change_id from the official Path of Exile API.

requestedStashes.description: The number of stashes the system attempted to fetch in the last cycle.

computedStashes.description: The number of stashes successfully processed in the last cycle.
